headers.value: default-src 'self'; frame-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; script-src 'self' https://helpmobile.vercel.app; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * blob: data:; connect-src 'self'; font-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'self'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
